metadata.title: K&H Pet Products Lectro-Soft Igloo Style Dog Bed, Tan, 40W/Medium/14.5" x 24"
features: OUTDOOR WARMTH: Outdoor heated dog bed with soft orthopedic foam base and includes free soft washable fleece cover
AUTOMATIC: Thermostatically controlled to automatically respond to temperature changes to warm to your pet's normal body temperature
ROUND HOUSES: Half-moon shape fits into round houses and is also the ideal waterproof outdoor warming dog bed for sheds, garages, barns, or any sheltered area your outdoor dog hang out
EFFICIENCY: This 14.5” X 24” electric heated dog pad features a 5-½ feet steel wrapped cord and uses only 40 watts of power

SAFETY: We don't just use safety listed parts; we safety certify the entire product. This outdoor electric heated dog pad has been tested & certified by MET Labs and exceeds USA/CA electrical safety standards
BRAND YOU TRUST: Designed by K&H with OVER 20 years of experience in creating safe, innovative, quality products
description: The K&H Pet Products Lectro-Soft Igloo Style Heated Dog Bed is the first soft, outdoor Igloo style heated bed on the market! The Lectro-Soft Igloo Style Heated Dog Bed is available in multiple sizes and is extremely low wattage. Half-moon shape is designed specifically to fit inside igloo and indigo round style cat and dog houses perfectly. This outdoor heated dog bed is also perfect for outdoor cat houses, doghouses, basements, garages, barns, sheds, porches, or any other outdoor shelter. This soft, orthopedic bed is unique in that it will still provide soft, comfortable warmth even in sub-zero weather! Super soft PVC is used on the exterior to ensure the bed doesn't absorb water and stay wet like a fabric bed would. Indoor or Outdoor use. This heated dog pad has been tested & certified by MET Labs to exceed USA/CA electrical safety standards. K&H doesn't just use safety listed parts; we safety certify the entire product. Designed by K&H with OVER 20 years of experience in creating safe, innovative, quality products for pets and includes a one-year limited warranty.

title: K&H Lectro-Soft Igloo Style Heated Bed
